phrases: Water.
Earth.
Fire.
Air.
Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
Um... are not you forgetting the tarp?
Right... got it.
Sokka, you are supposed to put the tarp on top of the tent.
You know, so we do not get rained on.
Ordinarily you would be right, but seeing how it is the dry season, you are not.
Besides, that tarp makes a pretty warm blanket.
But what if it does rain?
But what if it does not?
Then I would have put the tarp up for nothing.
You are infuriating!
Katara, why do not you worry about gathering the firewood...
Well if you do not like my firewood... have it!
Fine by me!
If you are not going to do your job... urg!
Okay, I got the grub if you guys got the...
Hey, where is the campfire?
And what happened to the tent?
Why do not you ask Miss Know It All?
Queen of the Twigs!
Oh yeah?
Well you are Mister Lazy Bum, King of the...
Tents!
Okay, listen guys.
Harsh words will not solve problems, action will.
Why do not you just switch jobs?
- Sounds good.
- Whatever.
You see that?
Settling feuds and making peace.
All in a days work for the Avatar.
Come on Momo, that is fair.
Appa's got five stomachs.
Here it is, guys, The Great Divide.
Wow!
I could just stare at it forever.
Okay.
I have seen enough.
How can you not be fascinated, Sokka?
This is the largest canyon in the entire world.
Then I am sure we will be able to see it very clearly from the air while we fly away.
Hey!
If you are looking for the Canyon Guide, I was here first!
OOO... canyon guide.
Sounds informative.
Believe me, he is more than a tour guide, he is an earthbender.
And the only way in and out of the canyon is with his help.
And he is takin' my tribe across next!
Calm down, we know you are next.
You would not be calm if the Fire Nation destroyed your home and forced you to flee.
My whole tribe has to walk thousands of miles to the capital city of Ba Sing Se!
You are a refugee.
Humph.
Tell me something I do not know.
Is that your tribe?
It most certainly is not.
That is the Zhang tribe.
A bunch of low-life thieves.
They have been the enemies of my tribe for hundred years.
Hey Zhangs!
I am savin' a spot for my tribe so do not even think of stealing it!
Where are the rest of the Gan Jin?
Still tidying up their campsite?
Yes!
But they sent me ahead of them to hold a spot.
I did not know the canyon Guide took reservations.
Heh!
Of course you did not.
That is the ignorance I would expect from a messy Zhang!
So unorganized and ill prepared for a journey.
Sorry about the wait, youngsters.
Who is ready to cross this here canyon?
Um... one of them I think.
I was here first!
My party's on their way!
I cannot guide people who are not here.
Guess you guys'll have to make the trip tomorrow.
Wait!
Here they come!
You are not seriously going to cave into these spoiled Gan Jins!
I mean, we are refugees too!
And we have got sick people that need shelter.
We have got old people who are weary from traveling.
Sick people get priority over old people.
Maybe you Zhang's would not have so many sick people if you were not such slobs.
If you Gan Jins were not so clean, maybe you would not live to be so old.
I could smell your stink a mile away.
Well Aang, ready to put your peace...
These people have been feuding for hundred years.
Everyone, listen up!
This is the Avatar!
And if you give him a chance,...
Uh... you could share the earthbender and travel together?
Absolutely not!
We would rather be taken by the Fire Nation than travel with those stinking thieves.
We would not travel with you pompous fools anyway!
I am not pompous!
Alright!
Here is the deal!
We are all going down together and Appa here will fly your sick and elderly across.
Does that seem fair?
Sorry Appa.
You will have to do this on your own.
And this feuding tribe stuff is serious business.
Are you sure it is a good idea getting involved in this?
To tell the truth, I am not sure.
But when have I ever been?
He is the Avatar, Sokka.
Making peace between people is his job.
His job's going to make us cross this whole thing on foot, is not it?
Okay, now comes the bad news.
No food allowed in the canyon.
It attracts dangerous predators.
No food!
This is ridiculous.
Aww, you babies can go a day without food.
Would you rather be hungry... or dead?
Now, we are headin' down in ten minutes.
All food better be in your gut, or in the garbage!
Appas's going to take good care of you until we get there.
See ya on the other side, buddy.
Yip, yip!
Nice bending!
The job's much more than bending, kid.
Folks want information.
Many of you are probably wondering how canyons are formed.
Experts tell us this canyon was most likely carved into the ground by Earth Spirits...
Guess the spirits are still angry!
Hope you all brought sacrifices.
Okay... everyone stand clear of the wall.
Why did you do that?
These people are fleeing the Fire Nation, are not they?
I got to make sure we cannot be followed.
We will be safe now.
We got to help him!
Okay... now you got to help me!
What was that?
Canyon crawler.
Oh, ugh!
And there is sure to be more.
Your arms... they are broken.
Without my arms, I got no bending.
In other words...
I thought the whole point of ditching our food...
It is the Zhangs!
They took food down here, even after the guide told them not to!
What!
If there is anyone who cannot go without food for a day,...
I hope you are happy.
We are stuck in the canyon with no way out.
Why do not you thank yourself, food hider!
Look.
Sticking together is the only way to...
I am not walkin' another step with the likes of them.
Now, there is something we can agree on.
Any ideas?
No bending.
We need to get out of this canyon.
I will not die down here!
I will not become part of the food chain!
See?
We are going to become part of the food chain because of you!
Sure.
Unjustly blame the Zhangs like you always do!
Gladly!
Enough!
I thought I could help you guys get along,...
We should split up.
Gan Jins on this side... and Zhangs on that side.
We will travel in two separate lines.
Sokka, you go with the Zhangs.
And Katara, you go with the Gan Jins.
See if you can figure out why they hate each other so much.
So, you guys are not going to put up your tarps?
What for?
It is the dry season.
Exactly!
Besides, we like to use the tarp as a blanket.
Finally, someone gets it.
You really think it will rain?
No, but you can never be too careful, right?
Would you care for some bread, Katara?
So it was you guys who had food!
Oh come now.
You really think that tribe of thieves is not smuggling food?
Why should my people go hungry when the sneaky Zhangs are stuffing their faces?
Well, I guess it is okay if everyone is doing it.
So, why does your tribe hate the Zhang so much?
You seem like a smart girl, Katara.
I bet you would enjoy hearing some history.
The patriarch of our tribe,...
Taking the orb from the east to the west represents the sun's rising and setting.
It was our tribe's ancient redemption ritual...
A vermin, named Wei Jin, who looked at the orb with envy.
That coward, Wei Jin, knocked Jin Wei to the ground and stole our sacred orb.
Our people have never forgotten.
You can never trust a Zhang.
Care for some meat?
Would I!?
I know what you must be thinking.
We are horrible for endangering everybody by bringing food down here.
The Gan Jin think so badly of us they probably assumed we brought food in...
Our conflict with the Gan Jin goes back over a hundred years...
Our forefather, Wei Jin, was leaving the western gate of our village...
It was a man of the Gan Jin tribe, Jin Wei, collapsed on the ground.
Noble Wei Jin stopped to help him.
Jin Wei was transporting a sacred orb,...
Wei Jin tried to tend to the man's wounds,...
Kind Wei Jin promised to send help for the man as soon as he could,...
Instead of thanking him for his kind and selfless deed,...
We Zhang's will never forget that injustice.
That is just terrible.
You going to finish that?
Sure would be nice to be around one of those campfires,...
Nah, I will wait for the leechy nuts.
It is lonely, is not it?
Being impartial.
I wish I could help these people get along, but it just seems impossible.
Anyhow, I guess our biggest problem is getting out of here.
I am not so sure the two problems are unrelated.
All clear!
We are almost to the other side.
Katara, Sokka, will these people cooperate long enough to get out of the canyon?
I do not think so, Aang, the Zhang's really wronged the Gan Jins.
They ambushed Jin We and stole the sacred orb.
What are you talking about?
Yeh, Katara, what are you talking about?
We Jin did not steal the orb,...
Not punished enough if you ask me!
Okay!
Okay!
I get it!
Now I need your help.
Let us get everyone together at the base of the canyon wall.
Please everyone!
As soon as we get out of here we can eat,...
Maybe the Zhang can climb the walls with their long, disgusting fingernails.
Oh, sorry!
I forgot that to the Gan Jin,...
Why you dirty thief!
You pompous fool!
Guys!
focus!
How many times do I have to say it?
Harsh words will not solve problems, action will!
Perhaps the Avatar is right.
Yes, perhaps he is.
Harsh words will never solve our problems...
To the death!
And let this be the end of this rivalry!
You know, I take it back!
Harsh words are not so bad!
Is that... food?
Everyone smuggled food down here!?
Unbelievable!
You guys put our lives in danger because you could not go without a snack for a day!?
You are all... awful!
So hungry... is that... egg custard in that tart?
Oh no!
That is a lot of canyon crawlers!
We barely survived one!
They are coming back for me!
They have had a taste, and they are coming back for me!
Sokka, wait!
I do not care about this stupid feud!
I just want us to get out of here alive.
Me too.
I only took their side because they fed me.
Everybody!
Watch me!
Do what I do!
Now, follow me!
We are riding out of this hole!
Everyone!
Get off!
We made it!
I never thought a Gan Jin could get his hands dirty like that.
And I never knew you Zhang's were so reliable in a pinch.
Perhaps we are not so different after all.
Too bad we cannot rewrite history.
You thieves stole our sacred orb from Jin Wei!
You tyrants unjustly imprisoned We Jin for twenty long years!
Wait a second!
Jin Wei?
Wei Jin?
I know those guys!
Yes, yes, we are all aware of the story.
No!
I mean I really knew them.
I may not look it, but I am 112 years old.
I was there a hundred years ago on the day you are talking about...
There seems to be a lot of confusion about what happened.
First of all, Jin Wei and Wei Jin were not enemies, they were brothers,...
And the eastern and western gates were the goal posts.
Jin Wei had the ball and was running toward the goal when he fell and fumbled it.
Win Jei did not steal the ball,...
But he stepped out of bounds, so the official put him in the penalty box,...
There was no stealing and no putting anyone in prison.
Just a game.
You are saying the sacred orb was actually a sacred ball?
Nope, just a regular ball.
What about our tribe's redemption ritual?
That is what the game was called, Redemption.
As soon as someone got the ball from one goal to the other,...
Do not get me wrong,...
I suppose it is time we forget the past...
Good to see ya, boy!
Did you miss me?
I cannot thank you enough, Avatar.
Well, you know, I try.
Let us travel to the Earth Kingdom capital as one tribe!
I am going too!
I am sick of this place!
That is some luck you knew Jin Wei and Wei Jin.
You could call it luck.
Or, you could call it... lying!
What!?
I made the whole thing up.
You did not!
That is so wrong.
Now where is that custard tart?
I am starving!
